ED_Title: Observer status  for the International Organization of Employers in the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText: At its 49th plenary meeting, on 9 December 2021, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Sixth Committee, (Footnote: A/76/486, para.7)  decided to defer a decision on the request for observer status for the International Organization of Employers in the Assembly (Footnote: See A/74/291.)  until the seventy-seventh session of the Assembly.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
